sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Products from '../Product' import data from '../../data'; import Ratings from '../Ratings'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { console.log(props.match); const product = data.products.find(x => x._id == 2); if(!product){ return
Product not found!
} return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Discription:

    {product.description}

  • Price:
    ${product.price}
  • Status:
    ${product.inStoke >0 ? In Stoke : Product out of stoke }
) }
